translation: (Special Record No. 4)

source_sentence: 西京西明寺沙門圓照撰
translation: Xijings Ximing Temple, written by the monk Yuanzhao

source_sentence: 有譯有本錄中聲聞三藏錄第四
translation: Fourth Record of the śrāvaka Tripiṭaka in the List of Buddhist Texts in the Existence of a Translation and a Source

source_sentence: 聲聞藏者小乘所詮之教也。
translation: "The śrāvaka canon is the teaching that's explained in the lesser vehicle.

source_sentence: 能說教主則示生滅應物隨緣。
translation: The master of the teaching that's elucidated shows birth and extinction and follows the conditions of living things.

source_sentence: 所詮之教則九部四含毘曇戒律。
translation: The teaching that's explained is the nine divisions, four aggregates, and the precepts and laws of the vidyāna.

source_sentence: 善男善女稟之而脫屣塵勞。
translation: Good men and good women take them up and are freed from the dust and trouble of it all.

source_sentence: 緣覺聲聞奉之而昇乎彼岸。
translation: Conditional awakening śrāvakas then receive them and ascend to the other shore.

source_sentence: 蓋真乘之小駕。
translation: It's a small vehicle of the true vehicle.

source_sentence: 乃菩提之化城。
translation: It's the transformation city of bodhi.

source_sentence: 誘進初心莫斯為勝。
translation: It's a great way to induce the beginner's mind, Moose.

source_sentence: 始乎仙苑迄彼金河。
translation: It begins in the park of the sages and ends at the golden river.

source_sentence: 所詮半字之文是謂聲聞之藏。
translation: The half-word text that's explained is called the śrāvaka canon.

source_sentence: 洎乎百川同會三車共適。
translation: Until then, the one hundred rivers converge together, and the three chariots fit together.

source_sentence: 齊登妙覺俱證泥洹。
translation: They all attain marvelous awakening and realize nirvāṇa together.

source_sentence: 豈有小大之異名。
translation: How could there be different names for the lesser and greater?

source_sentence: 信為我尊之漸誘者也。
translation: It's believed to be a gradual inducement from our venerable self.

source_sentence: 始自漢明丁卯之歲終我開元庚辰之年。
translation: It began in the year Dingmao of Hanming and ended in the year Gengchen of our Kaiyuan.

source_sentence: 小乘三藏見行者。
translation: The lesser vehicle Tripiṭaka has a total of 337 schools and 1,800 practices.

source_sentence: 總三百三十七部一千八百九卷一百七十帙為聲聞法藏。
translation: It's a collection of 137 sections, 1,809 volumes, and 170 books, which are the śrāvaka Dharma collection.

source_sentence: 科條別顯。
translation: The textual organization is clearly delineated.

source_sentence: 具如後列。
translation: It's listed below.

source_sentence: 聲聞契經藏　二百四十部六百一十八卷聲聞調伏藏　六十一部四百九十三卷四十五帙聲聞對法藏　三十六部六百九十八卷七十二帙小乘經重單合譯一百五十三部三百九十四卷三十一帙四阿笈摩經小乘契經之本故標初首後列餘經。
translation: The śrāvaka canon, consisting of 240 parts and 618 volumes, is the śrāvaka canon, consisting of 61 parts and 493 volumes and 45 volumes, and the śrāvaka canon, consisting of 36 parts and 698 volumes and 72 volumes, and the lesser vehicle canon, consisting of a single translation of 153 parts and 394 volumes and 31 volumes.

source_sentence: 長阿含經二十二卷二帙
translation: The Longer Āgama Sutra is in twenty-two volumes and two books.

source_sentence: 姚秦罽賓三藏佛陀耶舍共竺佛念譯單重合譯右此部經凡有四分總三十經(僧肇序云長含四分四誦合三十經以為一部)。
translation: The Yaoqin Tri Tripiṭaka of Kāśyapa, Buddhayaśas, and the Zhu Fonian Translation are a single, combined translation of the right-hand part of this sūtra, which has four parts and a total of 30 sūtras (the preface by Sengshao says that the four parts and four recitations of the Nagarjuna contain 30 sūtras in one).

source_sentence: 中阿含經六十卷(或五十八卷六帙)　東晉罽賓三藏瞿曇僧伽提婆譯第二譯(兩譯一闕)右此部經凡有五誦都十八品總二百二十二經別(僧肇長含序云中含四分五誦)。
translation: Middle Length Āgama Sutra 60 rolls (or 58 rolls and 6 books) The second translation of the Gautama Saṃghadeva Translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Eastern Jin dynasty (two translations and one missing) Right This part of the sutra where there are five recitations, all 18 grades, a total of 222 sūtras distinct (the preface of the Longer Āgama by Sengzhao Yun Zhongfan four parts and five recitations).

source_sentence: 增壹阿含經五十一卷(或五十卷或四十卷或三十二卷五帙)　東晉罽賓三藏瞿曇僧伽提婆譯第二譯(兩譯一闕)右此部經凡有五十品總四百七十二經別(僧肇長含序云謂增壹阿含四分八誦)。
translation: Increased by one Āgama sūtra fifty-one rolls (or fifty rolls or forty rolls or thirty-two rolls and five books) The second translation (two translations and one missing) of the second translation of the Gautama Saṃghadeva translation of the Kuśānīya Tripiṭaka of Kāśāmbī (two translations and one missing) Right This sūtra has fifty chapters totaling four hundred and seventy-two sūtras (the preface of the Saṃghadeva Āgama says that it is increased by one Āgama four parts and eight recitations).

source_sentence: 雜阿含經五十卷　(五帙)　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯　單重合譯右此部經說事既雜故無品次誦等差別(僧肇長含序云雜含四分十誦)。
translation: Zaohan jing 50 rolls (five books): Song Dynasty Tripiṭaka Kunabhadra Translation, single, double, and combined translation (Saṃzhao Chang'an preface: Zaohan sifen ten recitations).

source_sentence: 別譯雜阿含經二十卷(二帙失譯經中子注有秦言字雖不的知譯人姓名必是三秦代譯今附秦錄)右此部與前經文雖先後不次。
translation: The special translation of the twenty volumes of the Zaaghan jing (two books of lost translations in the sutra in which Tzu notes the presence of the word qin, even though it's not known that the translator's name must have been one of the three qin dynasty translations (now attached to the qin records).

source_sentence: 子細尋究不出前經。
translation: He didn't include the previous sūtras when he investigated them more closely.

source_sentence: 但撮要故為別部(佛般泥洹下諸經並是四含中別經異譯)。
translation: However, it's summarized as a separate section (the sutras under Fo Ban Nirvana are different translations of separate sutras within the four aggregates).

source_sentence: 佛般泥洹經二卷(或直云泥洹經)　西晉河內沙門白法祖譯大般涅槃經三卷(或二卷)東晉平陽沙門釋法顯譯今為法顯譯(如總錄中述)般泥洹經二卷(或無般字)新為失譯　附東晉錄右三經出長阿含經。
translation: The two-fascicle Nirvana Sutra (or simply the Nirvana Sutra) was translated into three (or two) fascicles by the Śākyamuni monk Baifazu of Hanoi in the Western Jin dynasty, and into three (or two) fascicles by the Śākyamuni monk Faxian in Pingyang in the Eastern Jin dynasty.

source_sentence: 第二至第四卷。
translation: The second to fourth volumes are the same as the first part of the procession sūtra.

source_sentence: 與初分遊行經同本異譯(其般泥洹經群錄皆云宋代求那跋陀羅譯者非也尋其文句多是古譯與功德賢所翻全不相類諸藏之中但有上卷無其下卷今為失源編在晉錄或有經本其佛般泥洹經上卷與般泥洹經上卷文句全同者本錯也)。
translation: The first part of the procession is the same as the sutra, and the translation is different (the translation of the Nirvana Sutra into Chinese by Qunabhadra in the Song Dynasty is not true.)

source_sentence: 人本欲生經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯右出長阿含經第十卷。
translation: (1. Ren benyuan sheng jing 1 roll 後漢安息三藏安世高譯 右出長阿含經第十卷。

source_sentence: 與第二分大方便經同本異譯(此人本欲生經上代群錄皆編在大乘經中者誤也)。
translation: It was translated differently from the second part of the Sutra of Great Skillful Means (this sutra on the birth of human beings as desires was mistakenly compiled in the scriptures of the great vehicle by a group of records from earlier generations).

source_sentence: 尸迦羅越六向拜經一卷(或云尸迦羅越六方禮經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯右出長阿含經第十一卷與第二分善生經同本異譯(比於本經此稍略耳中阿含三十三卷中亦有此經)。
translation: Śṛgālavādasūtra (or Śṛgālavādasūtra), one volume (also called Śṛgālavādasūtra), translated by An Shigao of the Tripiṭaka of Anzhi in the later Han Dynasty, comes out of the eleventh volume of the Chang'ahan Sutra and is a variant translation of the second part of the Shangsheng Sutra.

source_sentence: 梵志阿颰經一卷(一本有佛門解字一名阿颰摩納經)　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯右出長阿含經第十三卷與。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of Brahmā Ajñāta (a sutra with the letters Ābhāsvara and Ābhāsvara) was translated by Upāsaka Zhiqian of the Yuezhi family (right out of the thirteenth volume of the Longer Āgama Sutra).

source_sentence: 第三分阿摩晝經同本異譯。
translation: The third part of the Amoghavajra is a variant translation of the same text.

source_sentence: 梵網六十二見經一卷(一名梵網經)　吳月支優婆塞支謙譯右出長阿含經第十四卷。
translation: One Fascicle of the Sutra on the Sixty-two Views of Brahmā's Net (A Sutra on Brahmā's Net) Translated by Wu Yuezhi Upāsaka Zhiqian to the Right Out of the Fourteenth Fascicle of the Longer Āgama Sutras.

source_sentence: 與第三分梵動經同本異譯。
translation: It's a variant translation of the same text as the Third Part of the Sutra on the Movement of Brahmā.

source_sentence: 寂志果經一卷　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯右出長阿含經第十七卷。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of the Fruit of Zhi Zhi (a Brahmā's Net Sutra) Translated by Zhu Tanwulan, a monk from the Western regions of Dongjin, right out of the seventeenth volume of the Chang'ahan Sutra.

source_sentence: 與第三分沙門果經同本異譯。
translation: It's a variant translation of the same text as the third part of the Sutra of the Fruit of the śramaṇa.

source_sentence: 上八經十二卷同帙。
translation: The preceding eight sūtras are twelve volumes in length.

source_sentence: 起世經十卷(一帙)　隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯　出經題上　第五譯起世因本經十卷(恐濫前本題下別云起世因本經一帙)　隋天竺三藏達摩笈多譯出內典錄　第六譯　拾遺編入(謹按唐內典錄及靖邁經圖並云笈多三藏大業年中於東都上林園翻經館譯起世經十卷。
translation: The Arising World Sutra, Ten Fascicles (One Fascicle) Sui Tianzhu Sanzang Jñānagupta et al. Translation from the Sutra Title The Fifth Translation of the Arising World Causes Original Sutra, Ten Fascicles (For fear of confusing the previous title with a separate title of the Arising World Causes Original Sutra, One Fascicle) Sui Tianzhu Sanzang Dharmagupta Translation from the Internal Canon Record The Sixth Translation of the Arising World Sutra, Collected and Compiled (According to the Tang Internal Canon Record and Jingmai Jingtu, the Tripiṭaka of Gupta translated ten fascicles of the Arising World Sutra at the Shanglin Park Translation Hall in the Dongdu in the middle of the Great Year of Operations.

source_sentence: 今撿尋諸藏乃有兩本。
translation: Now, after searching through the various collections, there are two copies.

source_sentence: 大意雖同文句稍異。
translation: Although the general idea is the same, the text and the phrases are slightly different.

source_sentence: 至於品目時有差殊。
translation: As for the categories, there are differences from time to time.

source_sentence: 前經初云婆伽婆在舍婆提城。
translation: The first sūtra first said that Bhagavān was in the city of Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 後經乃云婆伽婆在舍羅婆悉帝城。
translation: The later sūtra says that Bhārgava was in the city of Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 若據梵言。
translation: If we go by the Sanskrit, then the latter sūtra is correct.

source_sentence: 後經為正。
translation: The latter sūtra is correct.

source_sentence: 今謂崛多笈多各翻一本。
translation: Now, it's called the translation of one copy of each of the two versions of the Gupta-gupta.

source_sentence: 又前經初首題云崛多笈多二師同出。
translation: The title of the first part of the previous sūtra says that the two masters, Gupta and Śārdū, both produced the same translation.

source_sentence: 今以前為崛多所譯。
translation: The former was translated by Gotama. The latter was translated again by Gupta.

source_sentence: 後是笈多再翻。
translation: The later one was translated by Gupta again.

source_sentence: 二經文既有殊。
translation: The texts of the two sutras are different.

source_sentence: 今故雙存二部。
translation: Now, therefore, they both exist in two parts.

source_sentence: 故緣生經亦云婆伽婆在舍羅婆悉帝城。
translation: That's why the Sutra on Conditioned Arising also says that Bhagavat was translated in the city of Śrāvastī.

source_sentence: 故知同是笈多譯也。
translation: Therefore, it's clear that it's both a translation by Gupta.

source_sentence: 恐二本相濫。
translation: It's feared that the two texts are confused.

source_sentence: 題下別云起世因本焉)。
translation: (Under the title, it's separately stated that it's the cause of the arising of the world.)

source_sentence: 樓炭經六卷(或云大樓炭經或五卷或八卷)　西晉沙門釋法立共法炬譯第二譯右三經出長阿含經第十八。
translation: The six-fascicle Lü Tan jing (or the five- or eight-fascicle Lü Tan jing) is the second translation by the Western Jin monk Shi Fali and the Dharma Torch.

source_sentence: 至二十卷與第四分記世經同本異譯。
translation: It is a variant translation of the same text as the fourth part of the Sutra of Recollection of the World.

source_sentence: 長阿含十報法經二卷(一名多僧道經或直云十報經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯右出長阿含經第九卷。
translation: Longer Āgama Ten Fascicle Sutra (a Tāshengdao jing or simply Ten Fascicle Sutra) Translated by An Shigao, the Tripiṭaka of Anzhi in the later Han, the right three sūtras are from the ninth volume of the Longer Āgama Sutra.

source_sentence: 與第二分十上經同本異譯(廣略少異)。
translation: It is a variant translation of the same text as the ten scriptures in the second section (with minor differences in breadth and scope).

source_sentence: 中本起經二卷(或云太子中起經初題云出長阿含)後漢西域沙門曇果共康孟詳譯上二經十卷同帙(其中本起經題云出長阿含撿尋大本無此一經或恐梵文譯之未盡既云出彼且編於末大周錄云與過去現在因果修行本起瑞應本起經等同本異譯者誤也又此中本起經群錄咸云後漢代譯其經本中有翻梵語處乃曰晉未詳何以)。
translation: The scripture of the middle part of the present arises in two volumes (or the scripture of the princely middle arises in the first title as out of the Longer Āgamas), and the later Han Western region Śramaṇa Tanguo co-translated the above two scriptures in ten volumes in the same book (the title of the scripture of the middle part of the present arises as out of the Longer Āgamas, Qiang's search for the great text does not include this scripture, or perhaps it is feared that the Sanskrit translation is not exhausted, since it is called out of that and is compiled at the end of the Great Zhou Record, which says that it is a variant translation of the same text as the scripture of the past and present cause and effect, cultivation, and response.)

source_sentence: 從佛般泥洹下一十三經。
translation: There are thirteen sūtras below the level of Nirvana of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 並出長阿含中。
translation: They are also found in the Longer Āgama.

source_sentence: 別經異譯。
translation: The other scriptures were translated differently.

source_sentence: 七知經一卷(或云七智經)　吳月支優婆塞支謙譯右出中阿含經第一卷。
translation: The Sutra of the Seven Knows (or the Sutra of the Seven Wisdoms), translated by Wu Yuezhi Upāsaka Zhiqian, is right out of the first volume of the Middle Length Āgama Sutras.

source_sentence: 與初善法經同本異譯。
translation: It's a variant translation of the same text as the first Sutra on the Good Teaching.

source_sentence: 鹹水喻經一卷(或云鹹水譬喻)僧祐錄云安公失譯經今附西晉錄右出中阿含經第一卷。
translation: The Salt Water Parable One Fascicle (or Salt Water Parable): A Translation of the Lost Translation of the Sutra by An Gong, Recorded in the Saṃgha, Now Attached to the Record of the Western Jìn Dynasty, Right Out of the First Fascicle of the Middle Length Āgama Sutra.

source_sentence: 與水喻經同本異譯。
translation: It is a variant translation of the same text as the Water Parable.

source_sentence: 一切流攝守因經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯右出中阿含經第二卷。
translation: Yiqieliu sheishou yin jing (Avalokitêśvara sūtra) 1 volume: Translated by An Shigao, the Tripiṭaka of Anxi in the later Han, right out of the second volume of the Middle Length Āgama sūtra.

source_sentence: 與漏盡經同本異譯。
translation: It's a variant translation of the same text as the Sutra on the Extinction of Contamination.

source_sentence: 四諦經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯右出中阿含經第七卷。

source_sentence: 與瞻波經同本異譯。
translation: It's a variant translation of the same text as the Zhanbo jing.

source_sentence: 本相倚致經一卷(亦云大相倚致)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯緣本致經一卷　失譯今附東晉錄右二經同本異譯。
translation: Benxiang yizhi jing one volume (also called Da xiang yizhi) Later Han Anxi trident An Shigao translated the scripture on the relationship between Benzhi and the lost translation now attached to the Dongjin records.

source_sentence: 出中阿含經第十卷。
translation: They are from the tenth volume of the Middle Length Āgama Sutra.

source_sentence: 頂生王故事經一卷(或直云頂生王經)　西晉沙門釋法炬譯文陀竭王經一卷　北涼天竺三藏曇無讖譯(拾遺編入)右二經同本異譯出中阿含經第十一卷與四洲經同本。
translation: The Story of King Mingsheng's Story One Fascicle (or just the King Mingsheng's Story) One Fascicle Translated by the Śrāmaṇer Shi Fajiao as King Mendakāra One Fascicle Translated by the Tripiṭaka Master Tan Wuzuan in Tianzang, Tianzang, and compiled from the Gleanings The right two sūtras are from the same text and a variant translation is from the Eleventh Fascicle of the Middle Length Āgama Sutra, which is the same text as the Four Continents Sutra.

translation: Yama's Sutra of the Five Heavenly Messengers (or Tie Cheng Nili jing) 1 volume (or a translation of the Tie Cheng Nili jing) 1 volume (or a translation of the Tie Cheng Nili jing) Translated by the Song monk Shi Huijian into Chinese by the Western monk Zhu Tan Wulan from the Dongjin region (compiled and arranged in a compilation) The two sūtras on the right are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 出中阿含經第十二卷。
translation: It is from the twelfth volume of the Middle Length Āgama Sutras.

source_sentence: 與天使經同本。
translation: It is the same text as the Sutra of the Angels.

source_sentence: 比於本經此稍略耳。
translation: It's a bit shorter than the present sūtra.

source_sentence: 古來世時經一卷　失譯今附東晉錄
translation: Sutra of the Ancient and Later Worlds and Times One volume, lost in translation, now appended to the records of the Eastern Jin dynasty.

translation: The right-hand side is from the thirteenth volume of the Middle Length Āgama Sutras.

source_sentence: 與說本經同本異譯。
translation: It is a variant translation of the same text as the present sūtra.

source_sentence: 比於本經此文稍略。
translation: It is a slightly shorter translation than the present sūtra.

source_sentence: 阿那律八念經一卷(一名禪行斂意經或直云八念經)　後漢西域三藏支曜譯右出中阿含經第十八卷。
translation: Analü Bānīyān jing (a sūtra on the practice of meditation and the recitation of mindfulness or simply called Bānīyān jing), 1 vol.

translation: Sutra on Giving Food to Obtain the Five Rewards of Merit One volume (a sutra on the power of giving form and a sutra on the merit of giving) Loss of translation (now appended to the Dongjin records) Right out of the twenty-fourth volume of the Zōichi Āgama sūtras.

source_sentence: 善聚品異譯。
translation: It is a variant translation of the Chapter on the Good Aggregate.

source_sentence: 頻毘娑羅王詣佛供養經一卷(亦云頻婆)　西晉沙門釋法炬譯右出增壹阿含經第二十六卷等見品譯(比於本經此稍文略諸錄編在大乘藏中誤也)。
translation: King Bimbisāra's Offerings to the Buddha: One Volume (also called "Bimba") Translated by the Śākyamuni Shi Fajiao, Right out of the Twenty-sixth Fascicle of the Zōichi Āgama Sutra.

source_sentence: 長者子六過出家經一卷　宋沙門釋慧簡譯右出增壹阿含經第二十七卷聚品異譯(本經稍廣)。
translation: Sutra of the Six Transgressions of the Son of the Elder Leaving Home One volume, translated by the Song dynasty monk Shi Huijian, right out of the twenty-seventh volume of the Zōichi Āgama Sutra, translated in a different category (the present sūtra is slightly broader).

source_sentence: 鴦崛摩經一卷(或有作魔一名指髻經)　西晉三藏竺法護譯(拾遺編入)上三十二經三十二卷同帙。
translation: Aṅgulimālīya-sūtra One Fascicle A translation by Zhu Fahou of the Western Jin Canon (compiled from the above thirty-two sūtras and thirty-two fascicles).

source_sentence: 鴦崛髻經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯
translation: Aṅgulimālīyasūtra 1 volume: translated by the Śrāmaṇer Shi Fajiao in the Western Jin Dynasty.

source_sentence: 右二經同本異譯。
translation: The two scriptures on the right have the same text and are translated differently.

source_sentence: 出增壹阿含經第三十一卷力品(此文稍廣)。
translation: They are from the thirty-first volume of the Zōichi Āgama Sutra, the Chapter on Power (this text is slightly broader).

source_sentence: 力士移山經一卷(或直云移山經)　西晉三藏竺法護譯四未曾有法經一卷(亦云四未有經或無法字)　西晉三藏竺法護譯右二經出增壹阿含經第三十六卷八難品異譯(本是一經別譯分二本經稍廣此出不盡)。
translation: One volume of the Sutra on the Powerful Man Who Moves Mountains (also known as the Sutra on the Movement of Mountains). One volume of the Sutra on the Four Unprecedented Dharmas (also known as the Four Unprecedented Dharmas or the word unavailable).

source_sentence: 舍利弗摩訶目揵連遊四衢經一卷　後漢外國三藏孟詳譯右出增壹阿含經第四十一卷馬王品異譯(周錄編在大乘重譯中者誤也)。
translation: Śāriputra, Mahāmaudgalyāyana, and the Four Quarters Sutra: One Volume (A Translation of the Mahāyāna Chapter, Volume 41, by Meng Shuang of the Han Dynasty)

source_sentence: 七佛父母姓字經一卷(一名七佛姓字經)　曹魏失譯右出增壹阿含經第四十五卷不善品異譯。
translation: Qifo fumu xingzi jing 1 roll (a Qifo fumu xingzi jing) Cao Wei lost translation right out of Zeng Yi ahan jing, volume 45, the unwholesome class of variant translations.

source_sentence: 放牛經一卷(或云牧牛經)姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯右出增壹阿含經第四十六卷放牛品異譯(此文稍廣)。
translation: Oxherding Sutra One Volume (also called Oxherding Sutra) Translated by the Yao-Qin Tripiṭaka Kumārajīva to the right from the 46th volume of the Zenith Āgama Sutra, Oxherding Chapter (this text is slightly broader).

source_sentence: 緣起經一卷(亦云十二緣起經)　大唐三藏玄奘譯(出翻經圖)右出增壹阿含經第四十六卷放牛品異譯(此於本經此文稍略周錄編為大乘單本者誤也)。
translation: One volume of the Sutra on Conditioned Arising (also known as the Sutra on Twelve Conditioned Arising) translated by Xuanzang, the Tripiṭaka of the Tang Dynasty (out of the sūtra translation chart) to the right of the 46th volume of the Zōichi Āgama Sutra, a variant translation of the Chapter on Herding Cows (this is a slightly abbreviated version of the sūtra, which was compiled as a single Mahāyāna text, a mistake).

source_sentence: 十一想思念如來經一卷(或云十一思惟)　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯　拾遺編入右出增壹阿含經第四十八卷禮三寶品初異譯(此十一相連有二經初十一事文意勘同後十一事尋之未見)。
translation: Eleven Thoughts on the Tathāgata Sutra One Roll (or Eleven Thoughts) Song Dynasty India Tripiṭaka Qunabhadra Translation Gleanings into the right out of the Increased by One Āgama Sutra, Volume 48, the first variant of the Chapter on Worshiping the Three Treasures (these eleven linked there are two sūtras, the first eleven matters, the text and meaning of the last eleven matters are the same, but the search for them is not visible).

source_sentence: 四泥黎經一卷(或云四大泥黎)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯(拾遺編入)右出增壹阿含經第四十八卷禮三寶品異譯(本經稍廣)。
translation: Four Nirayas Sutra One Roll (or Four Great Nirayas) Translated by Zhu Tanwulan, a monk from Western China in the Eastern Jin Dynasty (compiled from the gleanings) Right Out of the Forty-eight Volumes of the Sutra of Increasing One Āgama, a variant translation of the Chapter on Worshiping the Three Treasures (this sutra is slightly broader).

source_sentence: 阿那邠邸化七子經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯右出增壹阿含經第四十九卷非常品異譯(本經唯有四子餘意大同)。
translation: Anapindi huaqiezi jing one volume, later Han Anzhi tricang An Shigao translation, right out of Zengyi ahan jing, volume 49, extraordinary class, different translation (this scripture only has four sons, the rest of the meaning is the same).

source_sentence: 文愛道般泥洹經一卷　西晉河內沙門白法祖譯佛母般泥洹經一卷　宋沙門釋慧簡譯(拾遺編入)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Wenai dao banniepan jing one volume Xijin henei shaman bai fazu translation fomu mu banniepan jing one volume Song shaman shi huijian translation (gleaned from the compilation) right two scriptures same text different translation.

source_sentence: 出增壹阿含經第五十卷愛道般涅槃品。
translation: It comes from the Aikido parinirvāṇa Chapter of the 50th volume of the Zōichi Āgama Sutra.

source_sentence: 國王不犁先尼十夢經一卷　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯舍衛國王夢見十事經一卷　僧祐錄云安公失譯(今附西晉錄遺編入)右二經同本異譯出增壹阿含第五十卷大愛道般涅槃品。
translation: King Buryasena's Ten Dreams: A Translation One volume: The King of Śrāvastī's Dreams and Visions: A Translation One volume: The Lost Translation of the Record of Sengyou, Record of Yun'an Gong (now appended to the compilation of the remains of the Record of Western Jin).

source_sentence: 阿難同學經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯(右阿難同學經首題云出增壹阿含撿其大本無此一經既云出彼且編其末)。
translation: Anan's classmate sūtra, one volume, was translated by An Shigao of the Tripiṭaka of Anxi in the later Han (the title of the right Anan's classmate sūtra is Zōichi Āgama, and this sūtra is missing from the main text, which is both out of it and compiled at its end).

source_sentence: 從誡德香經下二十四經並出增壹阿含中別經異譯。
translation: The twenty-four sūtras below the Sutra of the Incense of Admonition are all different translations of different sūtras in the Incremental Āgamas.

source_sentence: 五蘊皆空經一卷　大唐三藏義淨譯　新編入錄右出雜阿含經第二卷異譯(此五蘊皆空經根本說一切有部毘奈耶雜事第三十九卷中雖有此經然不例別生所以存而不廢此乃律引契經非是契經從律而生也)。
translation: Although this sutra exists in the 39th volume of the Mahāsaṃgha-bhūmi-vikrīḍita-vinaya-vāda, it is not separately produced, so it exists and is not abandoned.

source_sentence: 七處三觀經一卷(或二卷)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯右出雜阿含經中異譯(此經首末有三十經初是七處三觀後名積骨以初名故也其初七處三觀經出第二卷後積骨經出三十四卷餘者散在諸文不次第一處也)。
translation: The Sutra of the Three Contemplations on the Seven Places in One Volume (or two volumes) was translated by An Shigao of the Tripiṭaka of Anzai in the later Han Dynasty, right out of a variant translation in the Saṃyuktâgama Sutra (there are thirty sūtras at the beginning and end of this sutra, the first being the three contemplations on the seven places and the latter being called Jijie and the bones because of its initial name.)

source_sentence: 聖法印經一卷(亦云直聖印經亦云慧印經)　西晉三藏竺法護譯右出雜阿含經第三卷異譯。
translation: The Sutra of the Sacred Dharma Seal (also called the Sutra of the Sacred Seal and the Sutra of the Seal of Wisdom) is a one-volume translation of the third volume of the Saṃyuktâgama sūtra.

source_sentence: 雜阿含經一卷　失譯　在魏吳錄
translation: Za'ahan jing 1 vol. lost in translation In the Wei and Wu records

source_sentence: 右出雜阿含經中異譯(此經首末有二十七經初三經出第四卷中而先後不次七處三觀經居其卷末文句大同前經此中稍廣其積骨經亦在其中未詳何以二經相涉餘者散在廣文自古群錄皆云失譯尋閱文句與七處三觀辭理稍同似是安高所出未見實錄且依舊為失譯)。
translation: (The first three sūtras are from the fourth volume, but the first three sūtras are not sequential. The text and phrases of the seven locations and three contemplations sūtras at the end of the volume are much the same as those of the previous sūtras, which are slightly broader and in which the scripture on the accumulation of bones is also included.)

source_sentence: 五陰譬喻經一卷(一名水沫所漂經亦云五陰喻經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯水沫所漂經一卷(一名河中大聚沫臂經)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯　拾遺編入右二經同本出雜阿含經第十卷異譯。
translation: Five Aggregates Parable Sutra 1 vol. (A scripture on the foaming of water, also called the Five Aggregates Parable Sutra) Translated by An Shigao, the Tripiṭaka of the Later Han Dynasty (A scripture on the foamy arm of the river) Translated by Zhu Tanwulan, a monk from the Western regions of the Eastern Jin Dynasty Gleanings are compiled into a different translation of the two scriptures on the same page from the tenth volume of the Zahya Han jing.

source_sentence: 不自守意經一卷(或無意字)　吳月支優婆塞支謙譯右出雜阿含經第十一卷異譯。
translation: Buzhi shouyi jing one volume (or no meaning at all) Wu Yuezhi upasai Zhi Qian translated the right-hand side of the text from Zaohan jing, vol. 11, a variant translation.

source_sentence: 滿願子經一卷　晉代失譯(今附東晉錄拾遺編入)右出雜阿含經第十三卷異譯。
translation: Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra: One volume (now appended to the compilation of the Dongjin records) Right out of the Thirteenth Fascicle of the Āgama Sutras: A Different Translation.

source_sentence: 轉法輪經一卷(或云輪轉經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯三轉法輪經一卷　大唐三藏義淨譯(新編入錄)右二經同本出雜阿含經第十五卷異譯(此三轉法輪經根本說一切有部毘奈耶雜事第十九卷中雖有此經然不例別生所以存而不廢此乃律引契經與其本經後同前異未詳所以)。
translation: Sutra of the Turning of the Dharma Wheel One volume (also called the Sutra of the Turning of the Dharma Wheel) One volume, translated by An Shigao of the Tripiṭaka of Anzai in the Later Han Dynasty One volume, translated by Yijing of the Tripiṭaka of the Tang Dynasty (newly compiled and entered into the records) The right two sūtras are the same and appear in a variant translation of the fifteenth volume of the Saṃyuktâgama Sutra (although this sutra exists in the nineteenth volume of the Mūlasarvâstivāda-vinaya, it is not an example of a sutra that was separately produced, so it exists and is not abandoned.)

source_sentence: 八正道經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯右出雜阿含經第二十八卷異譯。
translation: (8) The Sutra of the Eightfold Noble Path (1 vol.) Translated by An Shigao of the Tripiṭaka of Anzhi in the Later Han Dynasty (right) out of the twenty-eighth volume of the Zahya Han jing.

source_sentence: 難提釋經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯
translation: Nandi shi jing 1 roll 西晉沙門士士法炬譯

source_sentence: 右出雜阿含經第三十卷異譯(大本有二經此中合為一其文稍廣舊錄在單本中今編於此)。
translation: The right-hand side is from the 30th volume of the Za'ahan jing, which is a variant translation of the Mahāyāna sūtras (there are two sūtras in the Da ben and this one is combined into one, and its text is slightly more extensive than the old one, which was recorded in a single text and is now compiled here).

source_sentence: 馬有三相經一卷(亦云善有三相)　後漢西域三藏支曜譯馬有八態譬人經一卷(亦直云有八態)　後漢西域三藏支曜譯右二經並出雜阿含經第三十三卷異譯。
translation: Sutra on the Three Marks of a Horse One Fascicle (also called Shan has Three Marks) Translated by Zhi Yao, a Tripiṭaka of the Western Regions of the Later Han Dynasty One Fascicle (also directly called There are Eight Marks) Translated by Zhi Yao, a Tripiṭaka of the Western Regions of the Later Han Dynasty Right two sūtras together in a variant translation of the thirty-third volume of the Zaohan jing.

source_sentence: 相應相可經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯(拾遺編入)右出前單卷雜阿含經中異譯。
translation: Xiang ying xiangke jing yiqie xijin shaman shi falang yi (compiled from the gleanings) right out of the previous single-volume variant translation of the Za'ahan jing.

source_sentence: 治禪病祕要經一卷(或云法無經字或二卷)宋居士沮渠京聲譯(右一經初首題云尊者舍利弗所問出雜阿含經阿練若雜事中今尋雜含大本無此等文或恐梵經譯之未盡既云出彼且編於末然尋文理與大乘經微有相涉舊編在集傳中恐將乖僻也)上三十一經三十一卷同帙　從五蘊皆空經下一十六經並出雜阿含中經異譯。
translation: The Secret Essentials for Healing the Maladies of Meditation 1 volume (also called the Sutra of the Absence of the Characters for the Dharma or 2 volumes) Translated by Juequ Jingsheng, a Song householder (right, a sūtra whose initial title reads, "The question asked by the Venerable Śāriputra" (from the Zaohan sūtra, among the Āryanjñas and Miscellaneous Matters).

source_sentence: 摩鄧女經一卷(一名阿難為蠱道女惑經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯　第一譯摩鄧女解形中六事經一卷　失譯(今附東晉錄)　第五譯摩鄧伽經三卷(或二卷)　吳天竺沙門竺律炎共支謙譯　出法上錄　第三譯舍頭諫經一卷(一名大子二十八宿經一名虎耳經)　西晉三藏竺法護譯第四譯右四經同本異譯(前之一經但是後經一品前後五譯一譯闕本)。
translation: The first translation, the Sutra of the Mātaṅgī̄, is a one-volume work that was lost in translation (now appended to the Dongjin records). The fifth translation, the Sutra of the Mātaṅgī̄, is a three-volume work (or two-volume work) that was translated by the Indian monk Zhu Luyan and his companion Zhi Qian (out of the Fashang records).

source_sentence: 鬼問目連經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯(第一譯)雜藏經一卷(與前後經文理稍別)　東晉平陽沙門釋法顯譯(第二譯)餓鬼報應經一卷(一名目連說地獄餓鬼因緣經)　失譯(今附東晉錄第三譯)右三經同本異譯(前後四譯一譯闕本)。
translation: The Sutra of Mucilin the Demon's Questions One Fascicle Translated by An Shigao, the Tripiṭaka of Anzai in the Later Han (first translation) One Fascicle of the Zazang Sutra (slightly different in text and principle from the preceding and following sutras) Translated by Shi Faxian, the Shaman of Pingyang in the Eastern Jin (second translation) One Fascicle of the Sutra on the Retribution of Hungry Ghosts (a sutra entitled Mucilin's Explanation of the Causes and Conditions of Hungry Ghosts in Hell) Lost in Translation (now appended to the third translation of the Dongjin Record) Right three sūtras with the same text and different translations (the preceding and following four translations and one translation are missing).

source_sentence: 阿難問事佛吉凶經一卷(或名阿難問事經亦云事佛吉凶經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯　第一譯慢法經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯(拾遺編入)　第二譯阿難分別經一卷　乞伏秦沙門釋聖堅譯　第三譯右三經同本異譯(其慢法經新為重譯前後四譯一譯闕本)。
translation: The Second Translation of the Sutra of the Discrimination of Ānanda, One Volume, Translated by Śākyamuni Śākyamuni, the Third Translation of the Right Three Sutras (the first and last four translations of the Sutra of the Conceit of the Dharma are new and re-translated, and the first and last four translations of the Sutra of the Dharma are missing).

source_sentence: 五母子經一卷　吳月支優婆塞支謙譯　第一譯沙彌羅經一卷(僧祐錄云安公關中異譯在三秦錄)第二譯右二經同本異譯(其沙彌羅經大周錄云曇無讖譯長房錄今撿尋錄中無周錄誤也)。
translation: The Sutra of the Five Mothers and Sons, one volume, translated by Wu Yuezhi Upāsaka Zhi Qian. The first translation, the Sutra of Śāmila, one volume (recorded in the Saṃyuktâgama Records as a variant translation in the Angong Pass), and the second translation, the right two sūtras, are the same text and a variant translation (the Sutra of Śāmila, recorded in the Dazhou Records as a translation by Dharmakṣema in the Changfang Records, is incorrectly recorded in the Qanshen Records as a variant translation in the Dazhou Records).

source_sentence: 玉耶女經一卷(或云玉瑘經)　僧祐錄云安公失譯經　今附西晉錄初出　拾遺編入玉耶經一卷(一名長者詣佛說子婦無敬經)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯第二譯阿遬達經一卷　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯(第三譯)右三經同本異譯。
translation: One volume of the Yuyenǚ jing (or Yupeng jing), a translation of the Sutra of Yupeng, a translation of the Sutra of An Gong, which was lost in the Saṃyuktâgama records. One volume of the Yuyenǚ jing (a translation of the Sutra of the Son and Wife of No Respect by the eldest man who visited the Buddha), a translation of the second translation of the Anasaunda jing (a translation of the third translation by the Song Dynasty Tripiṭaka of India, translated by Qunabhadra), and the dissimilar translations of the three sūtras on the right.

source_sentence: 修行本起經二卷(一名宿行本起)　後漢西域沙門竺大力共康孟詳譯第二譯上十六經十九卷同帙。
translation: The Sutra on the Origin of the Arising of Practices in the Western Regions of the Later Han (a title given to the origin of the practices of the constellations) was translated by Zhu Dili and Kang Meng in conjunction with the second translation of the preceding sixteen sūtras and nineteen volumes in the same volume.

source_sentence: 太子瑞應本起經二卷(亦名本起瑞應亦直云瑞本起)　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯第四譯過去現在因果經四卷　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯　第六譯右三經同本異譯(前之二經文略不備前後六譯三譯闕本)。
translation: Taizi ruiying benqi jing 2 rolls (also known as benqi ruiying, also known as rui benqi) Wu Yuezhi upasai ciqian translation 4th translation past, present, and causes and effects jing 4 rolls Song Tianzhu sanzang qunabhadra translation 6th translation Right three sūtras in the same text and different translations (the text of the first two sūtras is abbreviated without the previous six translations and three missing translations).

source_sentence: 法海經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯(拾遺編入)　第二譯海八德經一卷　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯　出法上錄(拾遺編入)　第三譯右二經同本異譯(後漢三譯一譯闕本)。
translation: The Second Translation of the Sutra of the Eight Virtues of the Sea in One Volume: The Yao-Qin Tripiṭaka Kumārajīva Translation: The Record of the Exodus from the Dharma (compiled and edited by Gyeol).

source_sentence: 四十二章經一卷　後漢天竺沙門迦葉摩騰共竺法護譯(第一譯兩譯一闕)奈女耆域因緣經一卷(或無因緣字或直云奈女經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯　第一譯　兩譯一闕罪業報應教化地獄經一卷(或云地獄報應經)後漢安息三藏安世高譯　第一譯　兩譯一闕龍王兄弟經一卷(一名難陀龍王經一名降龍王經)　優婆塞支謙譯　第一譯　兩譯一闕長者音悅經一卷(或云長者音悅不蘭迦葉經)吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯　第一譯　兩譯一闕上九經十三卷同帙(其長者音悅經周錄之中編在大乘藏內今尋文理移之於此)。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of the Forty-two Chapters (first translation, two translations, one missing) One volume of the Sutra on the Causes and Conditions of the Jīvaka Land (either without the word causes and conditions or simply as the Sutra on the Causes and Conditions of the Jīvaka Land) First translation, two translations, one missing sutra on the retribution of sins and the teaching and transformation of hell (either as the Sutra on the Retribution of Hell).

source_sentence: 禪祕要經三卷(或云禪祕要法或四卷)　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯第二譯　三譯二闕(右此禪祕要經古舊群錄之中皆編之傳內今撿此經首末三分極以分明上下經文多明禪觀於觀佛觀等明懺滅重罪事然與大乘微有相涉既非製撰故移於此又群錄中更有禪要經五卷云是宋代三藏曇摩蜜多所譯文甚交錯不可流行如刪繁錄中廣述)七女經一卷(一名七女本經)　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯(第一譯三譯二闕)八師經一卷　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯　第一譯(兩譯一闕)越難經一卷(一名日難長者經一名難經)　西晉清信士聶承遠譯　第一譯　三譯二闕所欲致患經一卷　西晉三藏竺法護譯　第一譯(二譯一闕)阿闍世王問五逆經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯　拾遺編入第二譯　兩譯一闕五苦章句經一卷(一名五道章句經)東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯　第一譯　兩譯一闕堅意經一卷(一名堅心正意經一名堅心經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯　第一譯淨飯王涅槃經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯(第二譯兩譯一闕)得道梯鄧錫杖經一卷(亦直云錫杖經失譯今附東晉錄右此錫杖經大周錄云出雜譬喻經今大本既無難為定準且編於此)貧窮老翁經一卷(一名貧老經)　宋沙門釋慧簡譯(第二譯兩譯一闕)三摩竭經一卷(一名怒和檀王經一名難國王經)　吳天竺沙門竺律炎譯　第一譯　兩譯一闕(右此三摩竭經大周經錄云出增一阿含經撿彼中無且編於此)蓱沙王五願經一卷(一名弗沙迦王經)　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯　第一譯　二譯一闕(右此萍沙王五願經大周等錄皆云出中阿含撿彼文無且編於此)瑠璃王經一卷　西晉三藏竺法護譯　第二譯　兩譯一闕(右此瑠璃王經大周等錄云此增一阿含其增三十六中雖有瑠璃王緣起文意全異故編於此)上十五經七十卷同帙。
translation: There are also five other volumes of the Chan Essentials Sutra in the group records, which are translated by the Song Dynasty Tripiṭaka Dharmamitra and are quite mixed and unpopular, as extensively described in the Kanfan records.

source_sentence: 生經五卷(有五十經或四卷)　西晉三藏竺法護譯　第一譯(兩譯一闕)義足經二卷(有一十六經)　吳月支優婆塞支謙譯第一譯(兩譯一闕)上二經七卷同帙(合從四十二章經下二十二經雖重譯今見流行但有一本餘並零落尋求不獲)。
translation: There are fifty sūtras or four volumes of the Sutra of Life, the first translation by Zhu Fahou from the Western Jin Canon (two translations and one missing), and two volumes of the Sutra of Meaning (sixteen sūtras), the first translation by Wu Yuezhi Upāsaka Zhiqian (two translations and one missing), and seven volumes of the above two sūtras in the same book (together with the lower twenty-two sūtras from the forty-two chapters of the Sutra of Life, although they were translated again and are now seen to be popular, there is only one copy, and the rest are scattered and not available).

source_sentence: 小乘經單譯八十七部二百二十四卷一十七帙正法念處經七十卷　七帙　元魏婆羅門瞿曇般若流支譯(右此正法念經大周錄中編為重譯云與善時鵝王經同本異譯者誤也其善時鵝王經從此經抄出彼是別生此為單本)佛本行集經六十卷　六帙　隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯(右此佛本行經大周錄中編為大乘重譯云與七卷本行經同本異譯者誤也彼是偈讚與此懸殊諸錄或在大乘經中或編集傳之內恐將乖僻今移編此)本事經七卷　大唐三藏法師玄奘譯　出內典錄興起行經二卷(亦名嚴誡宿緣題云出雜藏)　後漢外國三藏康孟詳譯(右此興起行經大周錄云經為重譯云與木槍刺脚因緣經同本異譯者誤也比尋經本總有十緣其木槍脚經即十緣之一緣也鈔出別行如觀世音等類既非再翻故為單本)業報差別經一卷　隋洋川郡字瞿曇法智譯上三經十卷同帙(其業報差別經大周錄云與罪福報應經同本異譯者非也尋其文句義旨懸殊差別異也故為單本)。
translation: (Right, this Sutra of Mindfulness of the True Dharma is a single translation of eighty-seven parts, two hundred and twenty-four volumes, and one translation of seventeen books.

source_sentence: 大安般守意經二卷(亦直云大安般經安公云小安般或一卷)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯(右大周等錄更有大安般經一卷亦云安世高譯勘其文句即是安般守意經上卷文既全同故不重載)陰持入經二卷(或作除字誤也或一卷)　後漢三藏安世高譯處處經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯罵意經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯(拾遺編入)分別善惡所起經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯(拾遺編入)出家緣經一卷(一名出家因緣經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯阿鋡正行經一卷(一名正意經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯十八泥黎經一卷(亦云十八地獄經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯法受塵經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯禪行法想經一卷　後漢安息三藏安世高譯長者子懊惱三處經一卷(一名長者夭惱經亦云處三惱經)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯建陀國王經一卷(或無國字)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯須摩提長者經一卷　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯阿難四事經一卷　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯未生怨經一卷　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯四願經一卷　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯黑氏梵志經一卷　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯(拾遺編入)猘狗經一卷(祐云與櫟狗同)　吳月氏優婆塞支謙譯(拾遺編入)分別經一卷(舊云與阿難分別經等同本者非也)　西晉三藏竺法護譯(拾遺編入)八關齋經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯(拾遺編入)阿鳩留經一卷(僧祐錄云安公古典經今附漢錄)(拾遺編入)孝子經一卷(亦云孝報恩經僧祐錄云安公失譯經)　今附西晉錄(拾遺編入)上二十二經二十四卷同帙。
translation: The Mahāparinirvāṇa-sūtra in two volumes (also directly translated as the Mahāparinirvāṇa-sūtra, or the lesser Paranirvāṇa-sūtra in one volume) was translated by An Shigao of the Tripiṭaka of the Later Han Dynasty (to the right of the Dazhou Catalogue, there is also the Mahāparinirvāṇa-sūtra in one volume, which is also translated by An Shigao as the text is the same as the preceding volume of the Paranirvāṇa-sūtra, so it is not retranslated.) The Sutra on the Aggregates and Fields in Two Volumes (sometimes mistakenly translated as the sutra on the removal of words, or in one volume) was translated by An Shigao of the Tripiṭaka of the Later Han Dynasty into one volume.

source_sentence: 五百弟子自說本起經一卷(或無說字亦云本末)　西晉三藏竺法護譯大迦葉本經一卷(或無本字)　西晉三藏竺法護譯四自侵經一卷　西晉三藏竺法護譯羅云忍辱經一卷(或直云忍辱經)　西晉沙門釋法炬譯佛為年少比丘說正事經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯沙曷比丘功德經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯時非時經一卷(或直云時經)　外國法師若羅嚴譯(莫知帝代出經後記時非時經群錄皆云西晉沙門法炬所譯經後題云外國法師若羅嚴手執胡本口自宣譯涼州道人鎮城中寫記念依經記為正既莫知於帝代且附西晉錄中)自愛經一卷(或云自愛不自愛)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯中心經一卷(亦云中心正行經)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯見正經一卷(一名生死變識經)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯大魚事經一卷　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯阿難七夢經一卷(或直云七夢經)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯呵鵰阿那含經一卷(一名荷鵰或作苛)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯燈指因緣經一卷　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯婦人遇辜經一卷(一名婦遇對經)　乞伏秦沙門釋聖堅譯四天王經一卷　宋涼州沙門釋智嚴共寶雲譯摩訶迦葉度貧母經一卷　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯十二品生死經一卷　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯罪福報應經一卷(一名輪轉五道罪福報應經右大周錄中更有輪轉五道罪福報應經一卷今撿尋文句與此不殊但立名題廣略有異文既無別但存一本耳)五無返復經一卷(亦名五無返覆大義經)宋居士沮渠京聲譯佛大僧大經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯耶祇經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯末羅王經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯摩達國王經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯旃陀越國王經一卷(或無國王字)　宋居士沮渠京聲譯五恐怖世經一卷(或無世字)　宋居士沮渠京聲譯弟子死復生經一卷(或云死亡更生經)　宋居士沮渠京聲譯(拾遺編入)懈怠耕者經一卷(或云耕兒)　宋沙門釋慧簡譯辯意長者子經一卷(或云長者辯意經或加所問字)　元魏沙門釋法場譯無垢優婆夷問經一卷　元魏婆羅門瞿曇般若流支譯上三十經三十卷同帙。
translation: 五百弟子自說本起經一卷(或無說字亦云本末)　西晉三藏竺法護譯大迦葉本經一卷(或無本字)　西晉三藏竺法護譯四自侵經一卷　西晉三藏竺法護譯羅云忍辱經一卷(或直云忍辱經)　西晉沙門釋法炬譯佛為年少比丘說正事經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯沙曷比丘功德經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯時非時經一卷(或直云時經)　外國法師若羅嚴譯(莫知帝代出經後記時非時經群錄皆云西晉沙門法炬所譯經後題云外國法師若羅嚴手執胡本口自宣譯涼州道人鎮城中寫記念依經記為正既莫知於帝代且附西晉錄中)自愛經一卷(或云自愛不自愛)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯中心經一卷(亦云中心正行經)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯見正經一卷(一名生死變識經)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯大魚事經一卷　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯阿難七夢經一卷(或直云七夢經)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯呵鵰阿那含經一卷(一名荷鵰或作苛)　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯燈指因緣經一卷　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯婦人遇辜經一卷(一名婦遇對經)　乞伏秦沙門釋聖堅譯四天王經一卷　宋涼州沙門釋智嚴共寶雲譯摩訶迦葉度貧母經一卷　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯十二品生死經一卷　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯罪福報應經一卷(一名輪轉五道罪福報應經右大周錄中更有輪轉五道罪福報應經一卷今撿尋文句與此不殊但立名題廣略有異文既無別但存一本耳)五無返復經一卷(亦名五無返覆大義經)宋居士沮渠京聲譯佛大僧大經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯耶祇經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯末羅王經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯摩達國王經一卷　宋居士沮渠京聲譯旃陀越國王經一卷(或無國王字)　宋居士沮渠京聲譯五恐怖世經一卷(或無世字)　宋居士沮渠京聲譯弟子死復生經一卷(或云死亡更生經)　宋居士沮渠京聲譯(拾遺編入)懈怠耕者經一卷(或云耕兒)　宋沙門釋慧簡譯辯意長者子經一卷(或云長者辯意經或加所問字)　元魏沙門釋法場譯無垢優婆夷問經一卷　元魏婆羅門瞿曇般若流支譯上三十經三十卷同帙。

source_sentence: 賢者五福經一卷　西晉河內沙門白法祖譯天請問經一卷　大唐三藏玄奘譯　出內典錄(右賢者五福天請問二經大周等錄皆編大乘經中今尋文理頗涉小宗故移編此)僧護經一卷(或有因緣字)　失譯　今附東晉錄護淨經一卷　失譯今附東晉錄木槵子經一卷(或作患字或作擐)　今附東晉錄無上處經一卷　失譯今附東晉錄盧志長者因緣經一卷　失譯今附東晉錄五王經一卷　失譯今附東晉錄出家功德經一卷　失譯今附東晉錄拾遺編入(右出家功德經有三本流行餘二雖有廣略蓋從賢愚抄出云佛在王舍城迦蘭陀竹園中說今並載別生錄中此本佛在毘舍離國為梨專子鞞羅羨那說其中復云鞞羅羨那秦言勇軍雖不知譯人姓必是秦朝譯也)栴檀樹經一卷(僧祐錄云安公古典經法上錄云羅什譯者非也)　今附漢錄頞多和多耆經一卷(僧祐錄云安公失譯經)　今附西晉錄普達王經一卷(僧祐錄云安公失譯經)　今附西晉錄佛滅度後棺斂葬送經一卷(一名比丘師經亦名師)僧祐錄云安公失譯經　今附西晉錄鬼子母經一卷(僧祐錄云安公失譯經)　今附西晉錄(拾遺編入)梵摩難國王經一卷(僧祐錄云安公失譯經)　今附西晉錄(拾遺編入)父母恩難報經一卷(亦云勤報)　後漢安息三藏安世高譯(拾遺編入)孫多耶致經一卷(或上加梵志字)　吳月支優婆塞支謙譯新歲經一卷　東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯(右父母恩難報等三經大周等錄皆云出中阿含經撿其中含大本無此等經其增一阿含第二十四中雖受歲緣起大意全異故編於此)。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of the Five Blessings of the Good Person One volume of the Sutra of the Divine Questions translated by the Tripiṭaka of the Tang, Xuanzang (Right, the Sutra of the Five Blessings of the Good Person, the Divine Questions and two other scriptures compiled in the Mahāyāna scriptures, Dazhou and other records.) One volume of the Sutra of the Protection of the Saṃgha (some of them have the word cause and conditions), lost in translation.

source_sentence: 群牛譬經一卷　西晉沙門釋法炬譯
translation: Quniu piao jing (The Great Ox Parable) One volume, translated by the Śākyamuni Shi Fajiao in the Western Jin dynasty.

source_sentence: (右群牛譬經大周錄云出增一阿含撿彼中無故編於此)。
translation: (The Right Herd Ox Parable Sutra from the Dazhou Record is compiled here because it is not found in the Incremental Āgamas Collection).
